translations: 气候的，与气候有关的；由气候引起的，受气候影响的

sentences.sentence: The warming of the Earth and the consequent climatic changes affect us all.
sentences.translation: 全球变暖以及随之而来的气候变化影响我们每个人。

sentences.sentence: It must be possible to determine the time at which the inferred climatic conditions held.
sentences.translation: 必须能够确定所推断的气候条件所维持的时间。
